table.name: rz_dashboard_objectpostalcode
table.viewSql: SELECT sco.referenceid, sco.created, sco.modified, sco.collateralreferenceid, sco.agreementreferenceid, sco.processnumber, sco.postalcode, sco.place, sco.marketvalue, sco.purchasevalue, sco.executionvalue, sco.energylabel, sco.sequenceid, post.latitude, post.longitude, post.place AS place_postalcode, post.province, p.currentstatus, p.processstatus AS process_finished, p.processname FROM (((wlc.sz_collateral_object sco JOIN data_postalcode post ON (((post.postalcode)::text = (sco.postalcode)::text))) JOIN wlc.sz_agreement agr ON ((((sco.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text) AND (sco.processnumber = agr.processnumber)))) JOIN wlc.sz_process p ON ((agr.processnumber = p.processnumber))); SELECT sco.referenceid, sco.created, sco.modified, sco.collateralreferenceid, sco.agreementreferenceid, sco.processnumber, sco.postalcode, sco.place, sco.marketvalue, sco.purchasevalue, sco.executionvalue, sco.energylabel, sco.sequenceid, post.latitude, post.longitude, post.place AS place_postalcode, post.province, p.currentstatus, p.processstatus AS process_finished, p.processname FROM (((wlv.sz_collateral_object sco JOIN data_postalcode post ON (((post.postalcode)::text = (sco.postalcode)::text))) JOIN wlv.sz_agreement agr ON ((((sco.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text) AND (sco.processnumber = agr.processnumber)))) JOIN wlv.sz_process p ON ((agr.processnumber = p.processnumber)));

table.name: rz_dashboard_portal
table.viewSql: SELECT sz_portalrequest.referenceid, sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurUserLastName", sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurUserEmailAddress", sz_portalrequest.creationdate, sz_portalrequest.sentdate, sz_portalrequest."requestedLoanAmount", sz_portalrequest."financingGoalName", sz_portalrequest."repaymentTypeName", sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurIsPrivatePerson", sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurEmailAddress", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoLastName", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoMobileNumber", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoEmailAddress", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoOrganisationName" FROM wlc.sz_portalrequest; SELECT sz_portalrequest.referenceid, sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurUserLastName", sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurUserEmailAddress", sz_portalrequest.creationdate, sz_portalrequest.sentdate, sz_portalrequest."requestedLoanAmount", sz_portalrequest."financingGoalName", sz_portalrequest."repaymentTypeName", sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurIsPrivatePerson", sz_portalrequest."entrepreneurEmailAddress", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoLastName", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoMobileNumber", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoEmailAddress", sz_portalrequest."contactInfoOrganisationName" FROM wlv.sz_portalrequest;

table.name: rz_dashboard_processes
table.viewSql: SELECT p.processnumber, p.processname, p.processstatus AS process_finished, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours, p.currentstatus, p.numberofstatuschanges, p.firsttimeright, pe.bindingofferdate, pe.bindingofferdate_hours, pe.conditionalofferdate, pe.conditionalofferdate_hours, fac.numberoffacilities, fac.sum_agreedlimitamount, fac.sum_limitamount, fac.avg_loantovalue, fac.avg_debtservicecoverageratio, fac.avg_annualinterestrate, fac.avg_facilityduration, fac.avg_fixedrateperiod FROM ((wlc.sz_process p LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_processevents pe ON ((pe.processnumber = p.processnumber))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_facility.processnumber, count(DISTINCT sz_facility.referenceid) AS numberoffacilities, sum(sz_facility.agreedlimitamount) AS sum_agreedlimitamount, sum(sz_facility.limitamount) AS sum_limitamount, avg(sz_facility.loantovalue) AS avg_loantovalue, avg(sz_facility.debtservicecoverageratio) AS avg_debtservicecoverageratio, avg(sz_facility.annualinterestrate) AS avg_annualinterestrate, avg(sz_facility.facilityduration) AS avg_facilityduration, avg(sz_facility.fixedrateperiod) AS avg_fixedrateperiod FROM wlc.sz_facility GROUP BY sz_facility.processnumber) fac ON ((fac.processnumber = p.processnumber))); SELECT p.processnumber, p.processname, p.processstatus AS process_finished, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours, p.currentstatus, p.numberofstatuschanges, p.firsttimeright, pe.bindingofferdate, pe.bindingofferdate_hours, pe.conditionalofferdate, pe.conditionalofferdate_hours, fac.numberoffacilities, fac.sum_agreedlimitamount, fac.sum_limitamount, fac.avg_loantovalue, fac.avg_debtservicecoverageratio, fac.avg_annualinterestrate, fac.avg_facilityduration, fac.avg_fixedrateperiod FROM ((wlv.sz_process p LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_processevents pe ON ((pe.processnumber = p.processnumber))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_facility.processnumber, count(DISTINCT sz_facility.referenceid) AS numberoffacilities, sum(sz_facility.agreedlimitamount) AS sum_agreedlimitamount, sum(sz_facility.limitamount) AS sum_limitamount, avg(sz_facility.loantovalue) AS avg_loantovalue, avg(sz_facility.debtservicecoverageratio) AS avg_debtservicecoverageratio, avg(sz_facility.annualinterestrate) AS avg_annualinterestrate, avg(sz_facility.facilityduration) AS avg_facilityduration, avg(sz_facility.fixedrateperiod) AS avg_fixedrateperiod FROM wlv.sz_facility GROUP BY sz_facility.processnumber) fac ON ((fac.processnumber = p.processnumber)));

table.name: rz_dashboard_statuschange
table.viewSql: SELECT p.processnumber, p.processname, p.processstatus AS process_finished, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours AS process_durationtimehours, p.currentstatus AS process_currentstatus, p.numberofstatuschanges AS number_of_status_changes, sp.code AS statuschange_code, sp.name AS statuschange_name, sp.status_startdatetime AS statuschange_datetime, sp.processstatusgroupname AS statuschange_name_group, sp.userreferenceid AS statuschange_userid, sp.workingdaysinstatus FROM (wlc.sz_processstatuschange sp LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_process p ON ((sp.processnumber = p.processnumber))); SELECT p.processnumber, p.processname, p.processstatus AS process_finished, p.startdatetime AS process_startdatetime, p.enddatetime AS process_enddatetime, p.durationtimehours AS process_durationtimehours, p.currentstatus AS process_currentstatus, p.numberofstatuschanges AS number_of_status_changes, sp.code AS statuschange_code, sp.name AS statuschange_name, sp.status_startdatetime AS statuschange_datetime, sp.processstatusgroupname AS statuschange_name_group, sp.userreferenceid AS statuschange_userid, sp.workingdaysinstatus FROM (wlv.sz_processstatuschange sp LEFT JOIN wlv.sz_process p ON ((sp.processnumber = p.processnumber)));

table.name: rz_pipeline_applications
table.viewSql: SELECT agr.referenceid AS agreement_id, process.code AS process_status_code, process.name AS process_status, process.processstatusgroupname AS process_status_group, date(process.status_startdatetime) AS process_status_date, fac.agreedlimitamount AS original_principal_amount, process.whitelabel AS originator, 'Link'::text AS servicer, bo.cnt AS no_of_borrowers, agr.mainborrowerreferenceid AS mainborrower_id, cp.legalentity AS mainborrower_legalentity, agr.startdate AS origination_date, (date((agr.startdate + ('1 mon'::interval * fac.fixedrateperiod))) - 1) AS end_interest_rate_fixing, fac.fixedrateperiod, fac.annualinterestrate AS interest_rate, fac.repaymenttype, col.no_of_collateral_objects, col.object_place, col.object_postalcode, col.object_marketvalue, col.object_purchasevalue, fac.loantovalue AS ltv, fac.debtservicecoverageratio AS dscr, fac.interestcoveragerationarrow, fac.reversionmargininterestrate, fac.facilityduration, fac.borrowerfee AS upfrontborrowerfee, date(process.startdatetime) AS process_start_date, date(pevent.conditionalofferdate) AS conditionalofferdate, date(pevent.bindingofferdate) AS bindingofferdate, process.loanpassingdate AS process_passing_date, process.processstatus AS process_finished, other.additionalrentalincome, cp.annualincome, cp.employmentstatus, fac.discountrate, fac.discounttype, fac.nominalratebeforediscount FROM (((((((wlc.sz_agreement agr JOIN wlc.sz_counterparty cp ON ((((cp.referenceid)::text = (agr.mainborrowerreferenceid)::text) AND (cp.processnumber = agr.processnumber)))) LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_facility fac ON ((((fac.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text) AND (fac.processnumber = agr.processnumber)))) LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_processevents pevent ON ((agr.processnumber = pevent.processnumber))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_relation.agreementreferenceid, count(DISTINCT sz_relation.counterpartyreferenceid) AS cnt FROM wlc.sz_relation GROUP BY sz_relation.agreementreferenceid) bo ON (((bo.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cc.agreementreferenceid, cc.no_of_collateral_objects, cc.place AS object_place, cc.postalcode AS object_postalcode, cc.marketvaluesum AS object_marketvalue, cc.purchasevaluesum AS object_purchasevalue FROM ( SELECT sz_collateral_object.referenceid, sz_collateral_object.created, sz_collateral_object.modified, sz_collateral_object.collateralreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.processnumber, sz_collateral_object.postalcode, sz_collateral_object.place, sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue, sz_collateral_object.executionvalue, sz_collateral_object.energylabel, sz_collateral_object.sequenceid, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.referenceid DESC) AS rank1, count(sz_collateral_object.referenceid) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS no_of_collateral_objects, sum(sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS marketvaluesum, sum(sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS purchasevaluesum FROM wlc.sz_collateral_object) cc WHERE (cc.rank1 = 1)) col ON (((agr.referenceid)::text = (col.agreementreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ps.rownumber, ps.referenceid, ps.code, ps.name, ps.status_startdatetime, ps.status_enddatetime, ps.processnumber, ps.processstatusgroupname, ps.userreferenceid, ps.workingdaysinstatus, p.processname, p.whitelabel, p.startdatetime, p.loanpassingdate, p.processstatus FROM (wlc.sz_process p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_processstatuschange.processnumber ORDER BY sz_processstatuschange.status_startdatetime DESC) AS rownumber, sz_processstatuschange.referenceid, sz_processstatuschange.code, sz_processstatuschange.name, sz_processstatuschange.status_startdatetime, sz_processstatuschange.status_enddatetime, sz_processstatuschange.processnumber, sz_processstatuschange.processstatusgroupname, sz_processstatuschange.userreferenceid, sz_processstatuschange.workingdaysinstatus FROM wlc.sz_processstatuschange) ps ON (((p.processnumber = ps.processnumber) AND (ps.rownumber = 1))))) process ON ((process.processnumber = agr.processnumber))) LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_otherproperties other ON ((process.processnumber = other.processnumber))) ORDER BY agr.referenceid; SELECT agr.referenceid AS agreement_id, process.code AS process_status_code, process.name AS process_status, process.processstatusgroupname AS process_status_group, date(process.status_startdatetime) AS process_status_date, fac.agreedlimitamount AS original_principal_amount, process.whitelabel AS originator, 'Link'::text AS servicer, bo.cnt AS no_of_borrowers, agr.mainborrowerreferenceid AS mainborrower_id, cp.legalentity AS mainborrower_legalentity, agr.startdate AS origination_date, (date((agr.startdate + ('1 mon'::interval * fac.fixedrateperiod))) - 1) AS end_interest_rate_fixing, fac.fixedrateperiod, fac.annualinterestrate AS interest_rate, fac.repaymenttype, col.no_of_collateral_objects, col.object_place, col.object_postalcode, col.object_marketvalue, col.object_purchasevalue, fac.loantovalue AS ltv, fac.debtservicecoverageratio AS dscr, fac.interestcoveragerationarrow, fac.reversionmargininterestrate, fac.facilityduration, fac.borrowerfee AS upfrontborrowerfee, date(process.startdatetime) AS process_start_date, date(pevent.conditionalofferdate) AS conditionalofferdate, date(pevent.bindingofferdate) AS bindingofferdate, process.loanpassingdate AS process_passing_date, process.processstatus AS process_finished, other.additionalrentalincome, cp.annualincome, cp.employmentstatus, fac.discountrate, fac.discounttype, fac.nominalratebeforediscount FROM (((((((wlv.sz_agreement agr JOIN wlv.sz_counterparty cp ON ((((cp.referenceid)::text = (agr.mainborrowerreferenceid)::text) AND (cp.processnumber = agr.processnumber)))) LEFT JOIN wlv.sz_facility fac ON ((((fac.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text) AND (fac.processnumber = agr.processnumber)))) LEFT JOIN wlv.sz_processevents pevent ON ((agr.processnumber = pevent.processnumber))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sz_relation.agreementreferenceid, count(DISTINCT sz_relation.counterpartyreferenceid) AS cnt FROM wlv.sz_relation GROUP BY sz_relation.agreementreferenceid) bo ON (((bo.agreementreferenceid)::text = (agr.referenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cc.agreementreferenceid, cc.no_of_collateral_objects, cc.place AS object_place, cc.postalcode AS object_postalcode, cc.marketvaluesum AS object_marketvalue, cc.purchasevaluesum AS object_purchasevalue FROM ( SELECT sz_collateral_object.referenceid, sz_collateral_object.created, sz_collateral_object.modified, sz_collateral_object.collateralreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid, sz_collateral_object.processnumber, sz_collateral_object.postalcode, sz_collateral_object.place, sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue, sz_collateral_object.executionvalue, sz_collateral_object.energylabel, sz_collateral_object.sequenceid, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid ORDER BY sz_collateral_object.marketvalue, sz_collateral_object.referenceid DESC) AS rank1, count(sz_collateral_object.referenceid) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS no_of_collateral_objects, sum(sz_collateral_object.marketvalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS marketvaluesum, sum(sz_collateral_object.purchasevalue) OVER (PARTITION BY sz_collateral_object.agreementreferenceid) AS purchasevaluesum FROM wlv.sz_collateral_object) cc WHERE (cc.rank1 = 1)) col ON (((agr.referenceid)::text = (col.agreementreferenceid)::text))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ps.rownumber, ps.referenceid, ps.code, ps.name, ps.status_startdatetime, ps.status_enddatetime, ps.processnumber, ps.processstatusgroupname, ps.userreferenceid, ps.workingdaysinstatus, p.processname, p.whitelabel, p.startdatetime, p.loanpassingdate, p.processstatus FROM (wlv.sz_process p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY sz_processstatuschange.processnumber ORDER BY sz_processstatuschange.status_startdatetime DESC) AS rownumber, sz_processstatuschange.referenceid, sz_processstatuschange.code, sz_processstatuschange.name, sz_processstatuschange.status_startdatetime, sz_processstatuschange.status_enddatetime, sz_processstatuschange.processnumber, sz_processstatuschange.processstatusgroupname, sz_processstatuschange.userreferenceid, sz_processstatuschange.workingdaysinstatus FROM wlv.sz_processstatuschange) ps ON (((p.processnumber = ps.processnumber) AND (ps.rownumber = 1))))) process ON ((process.processnumber = agr.processnumber))) LEFT JOIN wlv.sz_otherproperties other ON ((process.processnumber = other.processnumber))) ORDER BY agr.referenceid;

table.name: rz_pipeline_borrowers
table.viewSql: SELECT rel.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, cp.referenceid AS counterparty_id, cp.legalentity, cp.datelastchanged, cp.address, cp.postalcode, cp.isholding, cp.counterpartysegmentcode, cp.counterpartycategorycode, cp.organisationname, cp.numberofemployees, cp.cocnumber, cp.sectorcodestandard, cp.legalform, cp.countrycode FROM (wlc.sz_counterparty cp JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sz_relation.counterpartyreferenceid, sz_relation.agreementreferenceid, sz_relation.processnumber FROM wlc.sz_relation) rel ON ((((rel.counterpartyreferenceid)::text = (cp.referenceid)::text) AND (rel.processnumber = cp.processnumber)))) ORDER BY rel.agreementreferenceid; SELECT rel.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, cp.referenceid AS counterparty_id, cp.legalentity, cp.datelastchanged, cp.address, cp.postalcode, cp.isholding, cp.counterpartysegmentcode, cp.counterpartycategorycode, cp.organisationname, cp.numberofemployees, cp.cocnumber, cp.sectorcodestandard, cp.legalform, cp.countrycode FROM (wlv.sz_counterparty cp JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sz_relation.counterpartyreferenceid, sz_relation.agreementreferenceid, sz_relation.processnumber FROM wlv.sz_relation) rel ON ((((rel.counterpartyreferenceid)::text = (cp.referenceid)::text) AND (rel.processnumber = cp.processnumber)))) ORDER BY rel.agreementreferenceid;

table.name: rz_pipeline_coll_object
table.viewSql: SELECT colobj.referenceid, colobj.collateralreferenceid, colobj.agreementreferenceid, colobj.processnumber, colobj.postalcode, colobj.place, colobj.marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue, colobj.executionvalue, colobj.energylabel FROM wlc.sz_collateral_object colobj; SELECT colobj.referenceid, colobj.collateralreferenceid, colobj.agreementreferenceid, colobj.processnumber, colobj.postalcode, colobj.place, colobj.marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue, colobj.executionvalue, colobj.energylabel FROM wlv.sz_collateral_object colobj;

table.name: rz_pipeline_coll_object_rental
table.viewSql: SELECT colobjrent.referenceid, colobjrent.collateral_objectreferenceid, colobjrent.agreementreferenceid, colobjrent.processnumber, colobjrent.regulatedproperty, colobjrent.pointscoreforregulatedrent, colobjrent.admissiblemonthlyrent, colobjrent.coldrentpermonth, colobjrent.marketbasedrent, colobjrent.totalrentpermonth, colobjrent.totalrentperyear FROM wlc.sz_collateral_object_rental colobjrent; SELECT colobjrent.referenceid, colobjrent.collateral_objectreferenceid, colobjrent.agreementreferenceid, colobjrent.processnumber, colobjrent.regulatedproperty, colobjrent.pointscoreforregulatedrent, colobjrent.admissiblemonthlyrent, colobjrent.coldrentpermonth, colobjrent.marketbasedrent, colobjrent.totalrentpermonth, colobjrent.totalrentperyear FROM wlv.sz_collateral_object_rental colobjrent;

table.name: rz_pipeline_collaterals
table.viewSql: SELECT col.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, col.referenceid AS collateral_id, col.collateraltype, col.definitioncode, col.description, col.valuationdate, col.valuationcurrency, col.valuationamount, colobj.referenceid AS collateral_object_id, colobj.postalcode AS object_postalcode, colobj.place AS object_place, colobj.marketvalue AS object_marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue AS object_purchasevalue FROM (wlc.sz_collateral col LEFT JOIN wlc.sz_collateral_object colobj ON ((((col.agreementreferenceid)::text = (colobj.agreementreferenceid)::text) AND (col.processnumber = colobj.processnumber)))); SELECT col.agreementreferenceid AS agreement_id, col.referenceid AS collateral_id, col.collateraltype, col.definitioncode, col.description, col.valuationdate, col.valuationcurrency, col.valuationamount, colobj.referenceid AS collateral_object_id, colobj.postalcode AS object_postalcode, colobj.place AS object_place, colobj.marketvalue AS object_marketvalue, colobj.purchasevalue AS object_purchasevalue FROM (wlv.sz_collateral col LEFT JOIN wlv.sz_collateral_object colobj ON ((((col.agreementreferenceid)::text = (colobj.agreementreferenceid)::text) AND (col.processnumber = colobj.processnumber))));

column.name: startdate
column.remarks: The start date of this credit agreement

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: The end date of the agreement

column.name: reviewdate
column.remarks: The review date of the agreement

column.name: agreementperfect
column.remarks: Whether or not this credit agreement is perfect

column.name: datelastchanged
column.remarks: The date the credit agreement was last changed (and lead to a new actual version of this credit agreement)

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an agreement

column.name: documentid
column.remarks: Internal identifier of the document (eg. document of type history)

column.name: documentid
column.remarks: Internal indentifier of the document of the history application

column.name: columnenddate
column.remarks: End date of the column in the history application

column.name: valuationcurrency
column.remarks: The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an collateral

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an collateral_object

column.name: postalcode
column.remarks: Free formatted postalcode, no specific country restrictions

column.name: isholding
column.remarks: Derived information and indicaties if the counterparty is a Holding company

column.name: counterpartysegmentcode
column.remarks: The segment code of this counterparty.

column.name: counterpartycategorycode
column.remarks: The counterparty category this counterparty belongs to.

column.name: foundationdate
column.remarks: The foundation date of the organisation

column.name: numberofemployees
column.remarks: The number of employees of the organisation

column.name: legalform
column.remarks: The legal form of a counterparty. Example values (nl): BV, NV, VOF. The values should correspond with the configured values in Force Business Lending.

column.name: countrycode
column.remarks: The country code that matches with a country description. The list of country descriptions can differ per customer installation.

column.name: externalreferenceid
column.remarks: Unique external reference identifier of an collateral_object

column.name: agreedlimitamount
column.remarks: The agreed or contractual limit on top-facility level.

column.name: agreedlimitcurrency
column.remarks: The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: limitcurrency
column.remarks: The currency code for identification of the currency

column.name: facilitystartdate
column.remarks: The start date of the facility

column.name: facilityenddate
column.remarks: The end date of the facility

column.name: description
column.remarks: Description of the key, value pair.

table.name: sz_relation
table.remarks: Associative table implementing the many-to-many relation between Agreement and Counterparty

column.name: borrowerrelationtype
column.remarks: Type of borrower relation (Main borrower or Borrower)
